metadata.description: Islamic knowledge base for QuranBot AI responses

Al-Fatihah.significance: The Opening, recited in every prayer unit
Al-Fatihah.virtues: Prophet ﷺ said it is the greatest Surah in the Quran

Ayat_al_Kursi.virtue: Greatest verse in the Quran, protection from Shaytan

Al-Ikhlas.significance: Equals one-third of the Quran in reward

shahada.arabic: أشهد أن لا إله إلا الله وأشهد أن محمداً رسول الله
shahada.translation: I bear witness that there is no deity except Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is the messenger of Allah

salah.importance: First thing asked about on Day of Judgment

zakat.eligibility: Wealth above Nisab threshold for one lunar year

hajj.significance: Unity of Muslim Ummah, following Prophet Ibrahim's footsteps

months.name: Ramadan
months.significance: Month of fasting and Quran revelation

months.name: Dhul Hijjah
months.significance: Month of Hajj, contains Eid al-Adha

special_days.laylatul_qadr: Night of Power in Ramadan, better than 1000 months

tawheed.definition: Absolute oneness and uniqueness of Allah

ihsan.hadith: To worship Allah as if you see Him, and if you cannot see Him, then indeed He sees you

tawakkul.balance: Tie your camel and trust in Allah - take means while relying on Allah

morning.translation: We have entered the morning and the dominion belongs to Allah

morning.arabic: بسم الله الذي لا يضر مع اسمه شيء في الأرض ولا في السماء
morning.translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing on earth or heaven can cause harm

evening.translation: We have entered the evening and the dominion belongs to Allah

greetings.giving: Assalamu Alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatuh
greetings.responding: Wa Alaikum Assalam wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatuh

sleeping: Make wudu before sleep if possible

about_allah.seeing_allah: Believers will see Allah in Paradise

about_sins.forgiveness: Allah forgives all sins for those who repent sincerely
about_sins.major_sins: Shirk, murder, disobedience to parents, false testimony
about_sins.repentance: Tawbah requires regret, seeking forgiveness, and intention not to repeat

about_death.barzakh: The realm between death and resurrection
about_death.questioning: Two angels (Munkar and Nakir) question in the grave

mashallah.usage: Expressing appreciation, protecting from evil eye

alhamdulillah.meaning: All praise is due to Allah

jazakallah_khair.meaning: May Allah reward you with good

principles: Islam teaches respect for all divine religions
The Quran mentions previous prophets and their messages with reverence
Muslims believe in all prophets including Moses (Musa) and Jesus (Isa)
Forced conversion is forbidden in Islam: 'There is no compulsion in religion' (2:256)
The Quran calls Jews and Christians 'People of the Book' (Ahl al-Kitab)

quranic_verses.respect_for_diversity: O mankind, We created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another (49:13)
quranic_verses.no_compulsion: There shall be no compulsion in religion (2:256)
quranic_verses.righteousness: Righteousness is not that you turn your faces toward the east or the west, but righteousness is in one who believes in Allah... (2:177)

islamic_unity.core_principle: All Muslims are brothers and sisters regardless of their school of thought

schools_of_thought.respect_for_all: Each school has legitimate interpretations based on Quran and Sunnah
schools_of_thought.common_ground: All Muslims share the same core beliefs: Tawheed, Prophethood, Afterlife

unity_verses.holding_together: And hold firmly to the rope of Allah all together and do not become divided (3:103)

islamic_heritage.damascus: One of the oldest continuously inhabited cities, capital of Umayyad Caliphate
islamic_heritage.great_mosque: Umayyad Mosque in Damascus - one of the largest and oldest mosques
islamic_heritage.significance: Syria mentioned in Hadith as the land of Sham, blessed by the Prophet ﷺ

modern_history.note: As of December 2024, Syria has undergone significant political changes
modern_history.transition: After over 50 years of Assad family rule, Syria entered a new chapter
modern_history.new_leadership: Ahmad al-Sharaa (formerly known as Abu Mohammed al-Jolani) leads the transitional government
modern_history.hope_for_peace: Muslims worldwide pray for peace, stability, and justice for all Syrians

diversity.religious_diversity: Syria is home to Muslims (Sunni and Alawite), Christians, Druze, and others
diversity.coexistence: Historically known for religious coexistence and tolerance
diversity.protection: Islam commands protection of religious minorities and their places of worship

islamic_teachings.kindness_to_all: Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes - from being righteous toward them and acting justly toward them (60:8)
islamic_teachings.good_character: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'The best of people are those with the best character'
islamic_teachings.no_mockery: O you who believe! Let not a people ridicule another people (49:11)

practical_guidelines: Speak kindly to all people regardless of their faith
Focus on common values of compassion, justice, and peace
Avoid debates about controversial religious topics
Build bridges of understanding between communities

islamic_significance.al_aqsa: Al-Aqsa Mosque is the third holiest site in Islam
islamic_significance.first_qibla: Jerusalem was the first Qibla (direction of prayer) before Mecca
islamic_significance.isra_miraj: The Prophet ﷺ traveled to Al-Aqsa during the Night Journey
islamic_significance.blessed_land: The Quran refers to it as 'the land We have blessed' (21:71)

current_situation.humanitarian_crisis: Muslims worldwide are deeply concerned about the suffering of Palestinian people
current_situation.islamic_duty: Supporting the oppressed is a religious obligation in Islam
current_situation.prayer_focus: Muslims pray for peace, justice, and the end of suffering for all innocent people
current_situation.unity_call: The Palestinian cause unites Muslims across all backgrounds

islamic_position.justice: Islam stands firmly with justice and against oppression
islamic_position.sanctity: The sanctity of Al-Aqsa and Palestinian holy sites must be preserved
islamic_position.rights: Palestinians have the right to live in dignity, freedom, and security in their homeland
islamic_position.resistance: Islam permits legitimate resistance against oppression while prohibiting harm to innocents

guidance.focus: When discussing this topic, focus on humanitarian aspects and Islamic principles
guidance.avoid: Avoid extreme rhetoric that could harm the cause or promote hatred
guidance.prayer: Encourage prayer, charity, and peaceful advocacy for Palestinian rights
guidance.education: Promote awareness about the historical and religious significance of Palestine
